post.body: your sex is on fire!
thanks for the advice!! :) im just really overwhelmed with all that is going on. I'm working on finding a release....
my dad ordered me a surprise flat screen tv that i have to pick up myself. doesnt fit in my car. dont know anyone with truck
between my over demanding job that im not qualified for and my huge amounts of homework and other life demands, im at my limit.
had an awesome time. now its back to reality.
and i just 'half assed' West Hollywood.
jon used the translation application on his mac book pro and he used the chinese something or other language.....
i survived my teaching day...im 9th out of 10 to present my website. #5 is presenting now....cant..stay...awake
i loved it! there was more i wanted to see...ill have to go back! :)
i just got your hobbie suggestions. ill have to think about them.....thank you though!
isn't that like conjunctivitis? good luck with that! feel better!
on twitter! sweet!
i have been up for freaking EVER!
my suggestions would be to buy lots of the variey packs. but i know Party City sells all kinds of candels
what kind of juicy info is inside those old books??!?!?1
i can't take credit for a meal. i got it from a bag! i can't lie!
that will be sweet! :)
i sorry :/
you make it sound horrible here! haha. we all know things could be going better around here!
fun times! all hail the Chief! :p
i hope that free-wheeling takes you down to Florida...does that count as the East Coast?
a trip to Florida is a good plan!
wednesday was grand. walked about 6-8 miles in beautiful weather in St.Petersburg, Florida for the Jingle Bell Walk. You?
what does she have against twitter and its users?
is your mom the Wicked Witch of the West?
"caylees" bones are being sent to Quantico, Virginia.....
awwwww "the boyfriend" tee hee
dont know yet. havent opened any.
get on aim or call back again. i was in shower when u called.
tattoo memories of waiting in that line! enjoy your red velvet!
i was thinking of randomly auditioning for a local play too! but i decided against it.
i am sorry love :(
can you get on AIM?
:( sorry i can't be there to make you feel better.
omg i have to get up for work in two and a half hours. im finished with my project, but i have something i need to make for a lesson tom.!
itchy itchy itchy tattoo!!! grabbing the lotion and soaking the tat!
so many papers/projects. feeling so unmotivated to do them. ARGH!
in need of a genuine companion. preferably male. and attractive.
omg....tattoo...itches....like...crazy!!!!
i want/need a hug.
i want to watch a movie....something along the lines of Wedding Crashers or Old School.
never had an anxiety attack..until about right now. i can't handle any of this!
http://twitpic.com/p92c - storm is coming
oh and now my dad ordered me a flat screen that i have to go pick up and haul in and out of my car by myself.
angry at myself for not getting stuff done before my trip.
spent 6 days in LA..didn't see a celeb until I was at baggage claim in Tampa. Stood next to Nick Boella (Hogan) and near his sis Brooke.
sore throat hurts. blech.
about to go home and sleep after only getting 2 hours last night.
OMG @vagrantvoice i think i fell asleep on the way to work this morning. i also think i fell asleep a few times on the way to class now.
facebook makes me bitter sometimes. engagements + weddings + babies = bitter.
OMG moment! spooky went up to kyna and licked her on her head, and she didn't do ANYTHING! she didnt hiss, bite, attatck,or ANYTHING!
thursday. almost the weekend. i need the weekend. i need sleep.
going out for the night. fun times ahead.
not gonna complain...but it must be a requirement for NCAA and NFL QBs to be amazingly attractive. kinda discriminatory, but I enjoy! :)
went to sears to pick up flat screen again! ohhh its not there. last week...they gave me the wrong tv. i almost took it home! soo no tv..
i believe that one day, maybe not soon, but one day Casey Anthony will crack and everything will become clear. i also believe Caylee is dead
cleaning the apt today. also getting my HD flat screen tv today! should prob do some lesson plans as well...
ugh. bored at home on a friday night. l.o.s.e.r.
oh how ive missed watching the office! love my jim!
comedy central is doing a great/horrible job of distracting me from writing this week's lesson plans.
because i procrastinate and have no motivation, it is going to be another long night.
"it could be so nice growing old with you..i'll miss you, kiss you....i wanna grow old with you"
http://twitpic.com/r1sb - dinner
Julia Gulia!
"love stinks yeah yeah"
Wedding Singer is kinda sorta making me feel better. Feeling slightly sick and very lonely. Adam Sandler will hopefully cheer me up.
i am getting sick. i can feel it.
living alone sucks. grocery shopping for just yourself sucks. carrying all the food in the house alone sucks. putting it away alone sucks.
trying to plan healthy meals for the week using the food pyramid. this is really difficult.
yay! concert! @theblondone im sure it was awesome! :)
$5 games at Walmart! Perfect for Toys for Tots! I bought 6 of them to donate! :)
Darn you Chalk and Wire! Why do you make things so difficult! I will fail my class because you won't upload! ARGH!
taking some Nyquil and hopefully getting some sleep. i can't breathe or talk.
i don't like being sick. its makes me vulnerable. and lonely.
i feel sick. like fever sick. it sucks.
i was told that i was looked very nice for work this morning. that compliment made my day. :)
health check: ears-clogged, nose-stuffed, throat-sore, head-hurts, how i feel in general-miserable, weak, tired. 7 schools days till break!
http://twitpic.com/rrhm - walking in the jingle bell walk in st pete.
dm @vagrantvoice i tried calling u. my cell doesnt let me make intrl calls.
http://twitpic.com/sp6x - tommy and i at holiday party
im at the zoo for a friends company holiday partay. free alcohol ftw!
dm @vagrantvoice this shin dig is nice and all but i would prob enjoy it more with you instead. :)
http://twitpic.com/skg0 - after all that! the flat screen ended up taking up the entire back seat!
accepted a formal date tonight. stupid. i dont own: a dress, heels, jewelry, small purse. i don't do formal.
i hate not having friends. i feel so helpless. :'(
freaking out! this is why i wanted to wait and order a television myself, so that it would be delivered. this is B.S!!!!!!
freaking out! anxiety attack coming! i have a flat screen tv. but no way to get it home! NOBODY has a truck or an SUV!!!! too young to rent
lots to do today.
skype ftw!
home from resort. the girls were adorable. the resort was amazing. the beach, the full moon, the waves, the stars. just wish it was warmer
http://twitpic.com/sbzo - teacher/librarian look
SANTAAAAA! OH. MY GOD! I KNOW HIM! http://tinyurl.com/4ey8vb
super tired. have to do some real babysitting tonight.
watching Nancy Grace. the forensics suspense is killing me!
oh and im hopeful (in a VERY bittersweet kind of way) that the "remains" are Caylees.
chilling with my Penguin Peeps http://tinyurl.com/4sbsxo
i have pics of when i was in la with @theblondone http://tinyurl.com/3ob2ad
i heart Nancy Grace!
waiting for Japan to wake up.
its been 80 degrees and b-e-autiful here. now i have to go north to Chicago where there is sleet, ice, snow, and bitter cold. bah humbug
wtf where did all my followers go?
one perk to being a teacher: presents from students! :)
guys cant lie about their size with these http://www.curiosite.com/condometric/enindex.html
getting out the 3-foot christmas tree. taking it to school tomorrow.
wrapping some gifts.
lounging on the couch watching "you've got mail"
http://twitpic.com/tom2 - i type too fast. i go to the University of South Florida which is IN Tampa!!

http://twitpic.com/tom2 - main entrance to the univ. of south tampa where im getting my masters.
http://twitpic.com/tksm - i am so proud of my crazy rice krispie treats!
finally finished with the progress reports. oh man!
1/2 my progress reports are done. taking a 2 hour power nap before i finish the rest in the morning.
http://twitpic.com/zhm1 - Jackson - my babysitting buddy
cant wait to go home and sleep in my big girl bed for the first time! =)
http://twitpic.com/zgy1 - bored while babysitting
i am not sure what to put here.
just spent the last 8 hours broadcasting on JTV. omg.
justin.tv/shannon114
my bed is here! come watch me enjoy my new bed! =)
my new bed is being installed as we speak! :) hurray for big girl beds!
Casey Anthony aggravates me. and I am not even an investigator or detective.
sorry ya'll JTV froze up my computer. i had to quit casting.
mattress giant f*cked up again and this time gave me a free upgrade to a pillow top/memory foam mattress! =)
i am broadcasting on JTV http:/www.justin.tv/shannon114
wish motivation came in a prescription bottle.
watching "What I Like About You" marathon on The N.
feeling kinda sad and lonely.
